content.detailedDescription:
In the orion area on january 31 2013 about 10pm. while videoing the area for about 25 minutes i notices a flash of light as big as two starts.
at first i thought it was an airplane just going by? i wasn���t able to see anything just by looking around trying to fine the airplane then another flash!  as i���m looking at my video viewfinder i see more flashing lights some seem to be bigger than others not sure what���s going on. my video was set at 60 zoom looking at the orion to the right upper area of the stars.  could the military testing nukes in outer space?  not sure maybe lots of colliding rocks exploding? it seem to be somewhat apart from each other that could be thousands of miles away?������.Anyone out there may no what this is or what could be going on���will try to down load the video it���s about 20 minutes long. have lots of videos i just been holding back to see if any others had video the same thing������������.Mufon give me a call soon������.
content.summary: Very big flishing stars at the orion area---nuke testing? or big rocks.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife first noticed the lights, while outside on our deck.
i thought it could have been a plane, but plane lights  don't encase the entire vehicle, and can be distinctly seen to be flashing  and just at
wing tips, or a bright white light when traveling toward you.  these appeared to traveling in a line and disappeared fairly quickly, after they got to about 60 degrees from the horizon, almost like they went higher.  they were observed from 60 degrees to overhead to 60 degrees then vanished.
content.summary: 5-6  orange -red  pulsaltinglights going from sw to ne

content.detailedDescription: Object apprd in photo of myself and friends playing horseshoes at beach.  none of us heard or noticed it at the time.
content.summary: Object appeared in photo when we put them on computer after the event

content.detailedDescription: 6-28-13,about 10:30 pm.  i was looking at the stars, for about 5-10 mins. then noticed two stars started moveing in different directions,far up , looked like stars at first then started to move one went s.W. the other n.E. cuveing a little not straight paths,during flight the one heading n.E. brightened, then dimmed, went above some clouds and gone. the other i lost in the sky haze from the lights from the ground. 2 commercial air craft were in the sky at the time,and then a helicopter "bay life flight"type, heading n.W. just as i lost them.I have seen this type of masking/hiding, before.. they will come in and sit like stars and after a while start to move,or just be there blacked out ,then light up a little bit like a dim star ,sit a little and then move and not just straight paths.Sometimes fly off at great speeds. or in flight black out ,but i sometimes can still see them fly blacked out depends on the weather,and if i have my binoculars.. i see many strange unexplained objects in the sky here.. comeing and going.. its hard to tell all that i have seen here in the past ,but tonight was weird two objects,heading in two different directions after sitting together. for how long they were there sitting, i dont know.But again not normal.. aircraft,ect. thank you and have a great day ..My phone 727 403 2345. i am not a good typest..
content.summary: 2 star like objects sitting ,then moved one  went s.W.,the other n.E. obove some clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
We were on a cruise and took a field trip to the tulum ruins, it was july 17th 2005 around noon and extremely hot, in all honesty, i did not see any of these objects until i went over the photos a couple of years later when in one of them there was something that caught my attention and i went over the other ones discovering more "objects". i posted a couple of these on youtube and the comments are that these objects are balloons.

if you see a map of the tulum ruins, you can see that the main temples sit on the edge of a hill with their back to the ocean. there's a very narrow beach behind them and we went down there where nobody was flying any balloons, we were all from the cruise ship and nobody lives close to the temples. 

on the one photo that started it all,109b, there's something yellowish-greenish but to its left and above, there's a bright sphere that when you zoom into it looks to have some antennae.

fyi i had to put a check mark in a few boxes that really should have been n/a but the option is not there, otherwise the submit  button does not work.

i leave it up to you to draw your own conclusions, and i would appreciate some feedback. thank you.

raul fagundez.
content.summary: Objects in the photos were discovered around 2 years after taken

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my home and taking pictures of the super moon with my new camera.  after taking a shot or two, 2 orange orbs shot up directly below the moon. at first we thought they were fireworks.
but then they moved up and over to the left of my house.  although they seemed to move in a path like a helicopter and at the height of a helicopter, they made absolutely no noise whatsoever.
in addition, they seem more to be floating than being run by any type of mechanics.  i took pictures
and was just able to download them on my computer today since i am learning how to use my camera.  i was surprised to see the results.  these objects were 100 percent not a helicopter, plane or balloon. they also were not stars or planets.  my best guess is they are some type of geological or atmospheric phenomena.  the only problem with that is that they seemed to know where they were going and not moving in a haphazard fashion.  they were definitely travelling together.  i will try to download the original photos as well as the photos of the moon i took that night.  i also will include a couple that i cropped and zoomed in on.  in one of the pictures, the object seems like three blurry white globes.  the objects floated out of sight.
content.summary: Was taking pictures of the super moon with my new camera. from below the moon came 2 orange orbs which me and my daughter thought were fireworks at first. they "rose " quickly and moved to our west. no noise at all.

content.detailedDescription:
We walked out the front door as usual to tke the dogs for a short walk.Jeanine noticed the object first and pointed it out to me,so we watched it travel i'm going to say about 3 times the speed of any jet plane then it briefly became a glowing ball or it took off and it was gone.The sky's were partly cloudy but there was no obstruction of view for the object for a ways,and yet it had disapeared.
 at first i would have thought it was a meteor but the almost perfect round sphere i seen before it disapeared negated that idea.
 our feelings were that it was not a meteor or anything we have ever seen or heard of,amusingly enough it reminded me of when captain kirk would put the enterprise in warp drive.
content.summary: A star like object traveling straight and fast became a globe or glowing sphere then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in a parking lot near my house and i was going to get the car
2. nothing
3. it was not a shooting star and even an aircraft.
4. the object is moving with straight line at high speed with the north-west. was not making any noise and had a long trail of light like falling stars but very strong. the ubject was spherical and had a light button.
5. i was still shocked, i looked to see if there were other things in the sky.
6. disappeared on the horizon
content.summary: Glowing ball at high speed with long white trail

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: The month of may/june. every night there is clear skys myself and my partner have seen the same lights appear in the sky out of nowhere. first one appears and then more appear and form a triangular shape of three lights. more appear out of this triangle and start to move, disappear and reappear in different parts of the sky. they also seem to take turns being in the triangle. one seems to dominate and doesnt move but gets different levels of brightness. at one point it gets so bright its like it is a huge fireball with flares. from looking like a star to a ball of fire? 100% it is in the sky and not outside our athmosphere. they must be miles away from where we were viewing them because i zoomed in on my camera. everything looked closer apart from the lights. i also noticed that when i photographed it, it reflected a light on the lense of my camera. and when i used the flash it got brighter/bigger. the same events happened almost every night and had very simular patterns. 100% not lights from plane or any human craft 100% not chinese lanterns. i know what i saw and i have pictures to prove it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights. brighter. appearing. disappearing. moving. triangular patterns.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On 6/27/13 at 11:04 pm i was taking the dog out before bed.  a large, bright, glowing, vividly red, pulsating light caught my eye in the ne sky.  it was coming rapidly in my direction (travelling sw).  my first thought was it was one of those floating lanterns, but it was traveling way too fast.  i also though perhaps it was an airplane, but knew that the red light would not be in the front of a plane.  it made no noise, which is what startled me.  i waited to hear something, but i didn't.  i ran to the house and yelled for my husband to come out quickly.  with the speed it was traveling, even though he was just a few feet from me, i thought we would miss it going over.  he came out and when we looked back up, the light was dimmer and a bit smaller and seemed farther away, yet still coming toward us.  the light appeared a little less red now - a little orangy red.  as i was explaining to him what it had looked like before he came out, he noticed that it had appeared to have stopped.  we then heard an airplane which was traveling west to east.  we stared at the object for probably 1 minute and the entire time it did not move.  the sound of the airplane disappated.  i positioned myself so that a power line was in my line of sight for reference.  the power line blocked my view of the object, which was perfect because this way i would be able to tell which way it moved, or if it stayed stationary.  i was surprised to see it ascend (as in away from the earth).  my husband also commented that it looked like it was going up and getting dimmer.  it continued to ascend and appear smaller and smaller and eventually cloud cover obscured the view.  my husband went back into the house saying, "you tell me....What was it?  you're the one who doesn't believe."  i continued to watch the sky for another five minutes, but did not see it again.  i know this is crazy, but it's almost as if it "froze" while the airplane was in the area.  i am not a believer, however i cannot explain what we saw and i frequently study the night sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large glowing red light coming toward us then ascended

content.detailedDescription:
This information is being filed by the maryland mufon sd following a 1hr personal interview with the witness.  note that the witnesss home phone listed above is that of his mother and that the email address is that of his mother. 

the witness, a 40 year black male, unemployed for the past 2 years following an auto accident, has had numerous sightings brginning at age 8. prior to his accident, the witness was employed, and has alwaws been employed, in sales. 

for the past 2 years he has been photographing what he considers ufo sighting that he has encountered within a block or so of his residence.
he showed me a number of these photos.  unfortunately they are stored on his camer phone which has a very small screen. the camera phone is a sprint scp-2700, with a resolution of 1.3 mp.  the photos i saw were of supposed "creatures" in the foliage.  while suggestive, the images on the camera phone were too small to be seen clearly. these images need to be downloaded to a photshop-like software program where they can be scaled up for better viewing and analysis.

based on his lokg term history of sightings, the witness is convinced he is recording ufos, orbs, creatures, etc.

the witness is a pleasant, well spoken individual, who is utterly convinced he is being led into these encounters. he will continue to believe his photos are the evidence until/unless they can be clearly shown to be othersise.

the witness claims to be not computer literate, so his photos will have to be downloaded by soemone who is.
content.summary: A 32 year history of encounters, the most recent of creatures in the foliage

content.detailedDescription: Date: friday, june 28, 2013. time: between 4:30 am & 4:45 am. event: 5 orange orbs witnessed in the pre-dawn eastern skies from the ground in orange, ca as i was heading to car to leave for work. the orbs were noticeably larger than planes and at first stationary before they began to drift apart. silent. one by one, each released 2-3 smaller orbs which descended, flickered white-orange in color before fading away below the orb that released it. after the descended orbs flickered & faded, the larger releasing orbs then flickered & faded out of sight one by one. the orbs may have been in sky longer before i exited house, but i witnessed event for at least 15 minutes. video feature on droid phone not sufficient to capture event, but attempted.
content.summary: 5 larger than planes orange pulsating orbs releasing smaller orange flickering orbs

content.detailedDescription:
I was out checking the garden at 9:00 am  . overhead i heard a jet so i looked up to see what kind it was. to the west, high up i saw a jet with a contrail heading west. but right behind it, also very high up was what looked to be a white ball. i could make out the shape of the jet, this was as large but she shape of a ball. it didn't leave a contrail and seemed to overtake the jet just to the left of it. it was moving at a similar speed. 
    that was what struck me as so odd, it was the shape of a ball, white in color. after about 5 seconds both disappeared in the clouds. 
     i went to flight radar 24 and found a jet heading west but only one in the area. 9:00 am over berks county pa. 
   i saw a strange light back on april 1st at night and reported it, this occurred during the day.
content.summary: Saw a white ball like object following a jet at 9:00 am over berks county pa

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back garden having a cigarette jets had been in the area all morning so was looking around to see if i could see them i could only hear them then i turned round looked up and there was a black ball hovering over the house it seemed that as soon as i noticed it it started to move off slowly in an  easterly direction picking up pace as it went turning in a very strange way somthing i can't explain it made no noise but as it started to move off it had almost like an energy around it i can only describe it like a heat wave all around it i have never seen somthing so blatent in all my life i felt like i had to do somthing as my heart is still racing from what i've seen as i know this is not a man made object i can't be
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Black ball hovering over my house then once i saw it it moved off very slowly picking up speed no noise an had a heat wave around it

content.detailedDescription: L'oggetto volante aveva un movimento strano, andava in accelerazione per poi fermarsi di scatto per ripartire immediatamente, aveva delle luci asterne che si rincorrevano e cambiavano continuamente di colore.
content.summary: Triangle with many light of variuous colours

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car with my father, when my he pointed out that there were two flare like objects in the sky, however in time we saw these "flares" not moving and just hovering in position, after a while one more light appeared forming the outline of a triangle. after 25 minutes the "flares" disappeared and one pulsating light and in five more minutes the light was out of our sight. this triangle hovered in place the entire time, we were awed by the sighting of this and we lost sight of the object once we got into the residential area of maricopa.
content.summary: Four lights apeared in the sky one pulsating, all others blinking randomly

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on back deck looking up at the sky, looking at the constellation ursa major when it appeared. it was like a yellowish orange glow like it was on the bottom of something, shot straight then took a left hook so to say. about 10-20 minutes after jets seem to patrol that certain spot, seen the same jet do a patrol so to say about 3 takes around then zoomed off.
content.summary: Looked like it appeared from bottom corner of ursa major

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my mom were standing outside cause it was hot in the house. i looked up and me and my mom started to just look at the stars. i saw a star like object and then noticed it was moving. it was going in a northerly direction. pointed it out to my mother but she didn't have her glasses on. it moved and then slowly disappeared. i'd have to say that if you put a ruler up to the sky and measured the object it would have moved 2-3 inches in the sky. me and my mom then decided to sit outside and just observe the sky. we saw the usual planes, helicopters and stuff. but then i noticed 2 more starlike objects moving south this time, one in front of the other, moving the same speed. my mom saw them as well. then she pointed out another small, starlike object moving across the sky, this time i couldn't see the one she was talking about. then we turned and looked behind us and saw this weird, cone like shape, more like a parabola; if you were looking at it from the side shape of light. it moved slowly then dissipated into a star like shape then dissipated fully. then we saw a asteroid or something, break apart in the sky. we saw it come down from the west, it glowed orange, then broke up into 2-3 smaller pieces and then went out. 

not sure what the small starlike objects were. my best guess is that they were satellites because of the south to north direction they were going. the parabolic light, i'm not sure of. and well, the falling star was a falling star. 

i've attached pics, just some photoshop stuff illustrating what i saw, they're not actual images.
content.summary: Saw 3-4 star like lights in the sky. and then saw a comet? break up.

content.detailedDescription: Above the star marach.  glowing fireball the size of an aspirin at arms length.  glowed brightly then disappeared after moving south for 5 seconds.
content.summary: Hovered and slowly moved to the south.  then disappeared with no trace.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling east along ne 12th street towards bryant.  at 10:25pm, i noticed a diamond shaped object in the sky, below the cloud cover.  it was shaped so that the lower half was smaller than the top half, and it had various white and red lights on it.  it immediately appeared strange and unfamiliar to me.  i turned my radio off and opened my car door, but could hear no noise at all coming from the object.  it passed over the houses heading east, stopped, hovered for a moment and then banked toward the north, continuing in that direction.  i lost sight of it as i turned into my driveway and it continued north.  i found the whole event to be strange, since we were in a severe thunderstorm area.  at the time, there was no rain falling, and the winds were calmer than previously.  there was lightening, periodically, which made the object even more visible.
content.summary: The ufo was shaped like a diamond, with the bottom half disproportionately smaller than the top.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a bright light ,heading north,dimmed on heading,then totaly out,north,heading, more sightings from my location,once a week, also one sighting folloeing an ac 130 coast gaurd plane just  before dark 830 pm about. many sightings here. not normal aircraft. sightings with commercial air craft and military aircraft in the air. you guys should visit around here.. no joke.Strange air craft flying around mostly at night.When i can see them better, my kids have seen this also..Also i would like to add ,the ufo that was seen in the ice land volcano plume i saw here in the middle of the day a year ago,about.West of my location. very weird stuff..For more info. on all of what i have seen here you may call me 727 403 2345. on 6 23 13 i also saw a triangle craft light up very high in the night sky release two dark round craft one went west the other went south,very fast rate of speed not normal craft,the larger triangle craft went north and gone,up..Pls contact me would like to share my info. with you guys. i have lived here for 10 years and love the night sky.. and come to like seeing the weird air craft here.. not satelights or normal air craft ,i have freinds who are pilots/military. and have lived around military bases all my life.Sir. have a great day.. many sightings here over the years..
content.summary: Bright light heading,n.Dimmed.And out.North,heading

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday june 26th, 2013, approximately 9:37pm things became unexplainable with a logical explanation.  me and my teenage daughter were travelling back from a brief stay on the eastern shore of maryland, we crossed the bay bridge and travelled north on 695 towards route 83 north to pennsylvania.  on 695 traveling north, right around the area where there is an exit to 83 south, there was a sign that said 83 north 2 1/2 miles (as there has been for the past 33 years i have been travelling back and forth from maryland to pennsylvania).  the last thing i contiously remember saying before things got really wierd was "that is how you get to the baltimore zoo" as we passed the exit to 83 south to baltimore, we were preparing to bare right onto 83 north in a few moments as it is,i believe the next exit (or maybe the one after, but takes only a moment to get to once you pass 83 south).  my 17 year old daughter was driving and i was assisting with directions so obviously we are sober, alert and paying attention.  the next thing i consiously remember (and what seemed to be only a second to me), we are confused to find ourselves on the farthest left hand of the lane, rather than the far right lane (to prepare to bare right) where we were. there were concrete media strips and i noticed that on the right hand side, we had passed concrete media strips decorated with these beautiful stone bricks in various shades of brown and grey.  that must be new, i say.  just then we see gas stations, hotels and fast food restaurants and i think to myself, we must have passed the 83 north exit, continued straight which should put us in the direction of towson (and if you continue north on 695 to new york)...I believed at the time that we were just past our exit and just need to turn around, (i looked at my clock and only 15 minutes had passed since we saw 83 south exit).  i go inside the first gas station and was told i am very far from my destination and recieve directions that will take me approximately 2 hours to get back to 83 north...I think there must be a shorter way, we are only 5 minutes off course.  i asked someone outside who gives us similar directions and says that we are about 2 hours away from our destination.  when my daughter asked what town we are in we are told numerous times we are in "washington, the district of criminals".  the gentleman advises us to not continue further on this road, it is very dangerous and that we will wind up in "downtown, district of criminals"...He says to follow him and he will show us where we can u-turn, which he does. as soon as we turn around we are surrounded by trees on both sides of the road.  there were no trees there before, there were concrete median blocks for the entire trip and i couldn't see the 4 lanes of traffic on the other side of the road, all of a sudden there are plush trees blocking both sides of the highway and we can no longer see the 4 lanes of traffic on the other side of the "median strips" which are no longer there.  all of the signs are brown, road signs, route signs and there were no information signs (gas stations, restaurants, lodges)...All of the signs are brown...  the road has a tan pavement (?)...A second later we are back on black pavement and the signs are normal (green for roads, symbols for different routes and streets with different colors, blue for information-gas, restaurant, lodges) not to metion, they were all the same cities we had just previously passed with brown signs.  we see that we are by nasa...On route 50, in washington, below baltimore (?).  we see a triangle shaped flying object flying low directly above the ground straight down the highway, over our car and behind us, it was travelling low and slow.  then a few minutes later, we see a diamond, or similar shaped flying object going from west to east with round lights on the outer surface spinning around the shape of the object that dissapeared over the trees on the far left.  it took us 2 or more hours to get home.  i have looked at a map, and found route 50 in washington.  there is no way we could wind up there in 15 minutes from the area where we were and let alone any route from 695 directlty to route 50...It definately would take at least 1 hour and 45 minutes.
content.summary: We were traveling by car and mysteriously ended up 2 hours away in 15 minutes,, everything was very strange in area

content.detailedDescription: I was laying outside at night in the grass watching the stars like i sometimes do when i'm bored or upset. i noticed a bright orange/reddish ball of light that i happened to notice moving funny and oddly large to be anything i've seen before, like a planet on it's closest nights, but bigger than that by far. the light was a steady glow, no pulsing or anything. it moved somewhat slowly way above me from the sw toward the sw. it would then stop (yes, just hang there) and turn a sharp change in direction (not like a loop, but like a corner), and it did this a few times. it would change direction quickly, but then move slowly. it then zig zagged a few abrupt times and shot off out toward the nw. it was way above me, so i couldn't see fine details, but i have never seen a plane or even bird move that quickly on a direction change. my father had actually seen the same thing (come to find out when i went inside and told him) but years ago when he was alone driving down a back road. he said the one he saw was seemingly following him from above. when he stopped the car and got out to see what the hell he was whitnessing, it stopped, hovered a momnent, then shot off. this was in 2006 or 2007, june. sorry i can't remember the year any better. i felt like my heart was going to burst, my throat was clogged with wonder and excitement of curiosity, and i must say, it changed my opinion on what may be around us without our knowing. i would love to experience it again. even at a distance, it was one of the most beautiful speciticals i have ever seen.
content.summary: Laying outside on my back and noticed bright ball of light moving. stopped, changed direction, stopped again, changed direction, eventually shot off. lasted a good minute. no planes in area at that time.

content.detailedDescription: At the local elementary school trying to fly a kite, and first noticed movement like a flock of birds, but it was a large group of yellow lights maybe 25-50 or more. they were visible for a few seconds, then disappeared, then reappeared as a reflection kinda like mylar balloons, then disappeared, and reappeared again as a reflective group. kinda like the way the sunlight reflects on fish scales. perfectly cloud free sky, object appeared and disappeared several times as it moved slowly from sse to nnw. first thought it was a flock of birds, then thought maybe a group of mylar balloons, but it was much bigger than either of these. object has been observed several times by members of my family. it slowly moves across the sky coming in and out of sight either as lights or a reflection from the sun, then totally disappears.
content.summary: Appeared and disappeared several times. appeared like a flock of birds would in the sky, but looked more like balloons, mylar reflecting light, then yellow light bulbs , then disappearing and reappearing several times over 3-4 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was hiking in the woods behind my house with two other friends at about 10:45 when i simply noticed a giant ball of fire that flew across the sky in a straight line very fast. my two other friends were seeing the same thing. it stopped for a few seconds, changed shape multiple times and then moved away from the planet extremely fast. it changed my personal views about the existence of ufo's. i captured a crappy video with my smartphone which i will somehow upload at a later date.
content.summary: Giant ball of fire that flew across the sky in a straight line very fast, stopped for a few seconds, changed shape multiple times and then moved away from the planet extremely fast. 2 others saw the same thing.

content.detailedDescription:
Just after sun down june 15, 2013, waiting for regulus to sight the moon's arc distance with a sextant.  expected venus to appear low in the western sky, regulus about 45 degrees and the moon near zenith.

a bright light which i mistook for regulus appears before venus.  while unusual, i mistook it for regulus and sighted the moon against it.  i observed them converging at 15 min arc/ min in my sextant.  of course that is impossible for any celestial object, because the earth is moving at that speed, so all celestial objects appear to move with it.  the moon's apparent motion is 30 sec arc /min against the stars.  satellites move much faster.  

nothing stands still.  i now realized it was not regulus.  i took the light's altitude to confirm it was standing still.  it was geo-stationary.  it was hovering over the same point on earth between 200 miles and 3500 miles west of my location.  i can demonstrate the math upon request, but won't here for brevity.

this light was far from the positions possible for geo-stationary satellites which are far too dim to see anyway.

i sighted it for twenty minutes.  then it simply disappeared.  switched off.  went dark.

nothing in the atmosphere could have behaved this way.  nothing in space could have remained stationary without controlled powered flight.  nothing manmade could maintain geo-position.  we just don't have the power yet.

it seems to me that since most people would have overlooked the significants of the unique properties of this light i observed, these events must be far more common that we imagine to make it probable enough for me to observe.  my calculations suggest that for a likelihood of my observation to be greater than negligible such an event must occur unobserved 11 times per every hour somewhere in the world.
content.summary: Geo-stationary point of light

content.detailedDescription: Last night i took my dog for a short pee break in the front of the house which faces east along a north south running street. as a looked about for anything unusual, i spotted a group of the dull white object as seen several days ago. this time our local ufo caught them coming through our area because they came through earlier than usual. it was circling around the group which this time was up in the upper statratusphere i think. while he was doing that the smaller objects i have often seen with it were in a lower altitude. as i had been standing there a yellow object started flashing his light and coming lower and at me, i think it was trying to warn me that what ever these new objects were not something to be around and was trying to warn me to get back into the house and that is what is what i did. i figured it knew more than i did. i have seen these smaller craft on more than one occassion fighting other ufos as fighters. i have known since shortly after discovering their existance they were also aware of me. this is the first time i have had one of them approach me and made me feel better. it came down to tree top level trying to warn me.
content.summary: White square ufos back earlier in the evening than usual

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was a cloudy night on june 26th 2013 at 11:15pm (last night). i was having a cigarette out the window of my 5th floor apartment, facing north, when i saw a bright white light with a smaller red light descending from the clouds towards my direction (south). i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, and thought nothing of it, but then i kept watching and smoking, and then i saw 2 very bright white lights moving from west to east across the sky, just over a bridge leading to the downtown core. they were moving very quickly, faster than any airplane (maybe the speed of a jet or a meteor?). for a moment i thought it could have been a terrorist attack, or planes about to crash into the downtown core because they were traveling incredibly fast and dangerously close to the ground in a busy city centre. i called for my boyfriend to look out the window, and he missed them. but then around 5 seconds later, there were 2 more similar objects (large, very bright white lights) moving in the same direction (east) very quickly. my boyfriend saw the latter objects as well. once the objects went further east, our view was obstructed by buildings/condos further northeast. i kept watching, and i saw them actually weaving through the buildings/condos. i thought they may have been some kind of helicopter or meteor, but the objects did not make any sounds, and they were moving up, down, and side-to-side around the buildings/condos, almost like how flies are able to buzz around people but they moved incredibly quickly, as if gravity did not affect them. then they moved northeast, into the clouds. in total, i saw about 4 or 5 objects (5 if i count the first object that descended from the clouds as a separate object than the 4 i saw moving horizontally from east to west). 

during the event, i tried to take a picture, but the objects were moving too fast for me to turn on my iphone screen and to take the video/photo. i took a picture of the direction where the objects disappeared into, but it is dark, poor quality, and you can only make out the city lights. 

after the event, i heard planes flying overhead. it is strange because the planes made noticeable sounds of propelling through the air, but the objects did not make any sounds.
content.summary: Multiple bright white lights moving very quickly through major city skyline, soundlessly.

content.detailedDescription:
On june 25th 2013 approx. 7:30 pm i took pictures of my car. while downloading the pix to pc, i noticed a strange object in the sky. after noticing the object i went outside to take more pictures of that area of the western sky. that object did not show, but other objects showed in the photos. strange objects were not detected in some of the pictures. i also, zoomed in on the object by using a pc software and was able to capture a close-up.

the following day on the 26th, after a thunderstorm, approx. 6:30 pm, i decided to take pictures of the same area of the sky. i could not see any objects with my naked eye, but did see an object showing in the photos. some of the specs are from raindrops on the window, because i took those pictures through the glass on the porch, but there is a distinct object directly in front of the sun breaking through the clouds. 

today 6/27/13 at approx. 9:00 am i once a again took pictures of the western sky. at first i thought there was nothing. however, as i looked harder i see approx. 4 objects in the clouds at a distance.

there seems to be a lot of ufo activity going on in the western skies. one cannot detect this with their naked eye, but my aiptek mpvr 2k6 camcorder can detect the objects.
content.summary: Strange objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was grilling last night, it was very hot out, i remember thinking to myself, why did i even suggest i do this. i heard a boom sound, not like an explosion, almost like a sonic boom but softer.. looking around the area, i see nothing. i look up into the sky and i see a jet with obvious contrails behind it, chasing a ufo? it left no trace of contrails and it seemed to really be moving. i grab my cell phone and take some photos, of what best photos i can. then a second jet appears from the opposite direction, heading for the object head on. the object seems to slow and move out of the way and the jets fly by and the object takes off again - i remember thinking to myself, what am i seeing here.. that has to be a jet.. but where are the contrails, and why does it slow down and take off so erratic, oh my food was burning too. - unfortunately i was the only one around that seen it.
content.summary: Boom sound, look up and see jet chasing something
